wiki.content:
The intro to Invincible was originally composed whilst in a motel in the Twin Peaks.  Bellamy has described himself as having been bored at the time of the intro's conception, due to the band being ill, and the weather consisting of snowfall.  Bellamy believes that this is a very optimistic song.  He believes that Invincible is the "heart" of Black Holes and Revelations.
 
 The song was initially played entirely on the guitar, without any keyboard part - Bellamy altered the introduction to its present keyboard form whilst rehearsing in the live room of Miraval Studio, and the lyrics came sometime after this.  The band recorded Invincible in "a fit of rage" due to not having been able to record Take a Bow.  It was originally thought of as a track that would not make the final album, however, this changed after the recording came together quickly in the studio.  The recording presented on the album is mostly a live one, with only a "couple" of overdubbed tracks.  When recording the marching drums, the band set up microphone by a window and marched towards it drumming, to build up the impression of an approaching army. 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

The song was initially played entirely on the guitar, without any keyboard part - Bellamy altered the introduction to its present keyboard form whilst rehearsing in the live room of Miraval Studio...

track.name: Invincible
comments: this song helped me to continue living a dozen times. all time favourite. inspirational... and was amazing at HAARP!
In love with this song. ♥
Dat solo.
this is a song for a super hero band movie like Avangers or xmen !
PERFECT!
bueniiiisima!!!
A melhor performance do H.A.A.R.P. é a dessa faixa <33
I keep expecting them to say: Well, tonight thank God it's them instead of yoooouuuuuuuu  :L
esta canción me ah acompañado un buen rato por la vida ya :3 es perfecta
Everybody Changin (Muse edit)
nice solo
i love this song
Together we're invincible ♥
I can't understand how you can't like this. [2]
Odio esta canción, es la canción que me dedico la persona que mas me ha lastimado en toda mi vida :/ solía ser mi preferida de Muse.
Essa deve ser minha música preferida deles. Toda bonita. (:
I can't understand how you can't like this.
awesome solo
The solo and the last chorus are SO GOOD live - so much more dramatic and massive.
Brilliant and incredibly underrated, needs to be played more live.
